ModMetaData.name: Royalty eye bionic
ModMetaData.author: Sovereign,DetVisor
ModMetaData.description: A prestigious yet advanced artificial eye. A complex mannerism analyzer compares and studies the body language and speech patterns of users, suggesting to the implantee the best ways to respond or react. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way.
